author: Gerardo Gómez
comment: Nice

author: ryan berry
comment: This beautifully designed watch face has a high concentration of useful information always visible with a quick glance. It manages to do this while still looking great. It has the time, date, phone & watch battery levels, missed call count, missed SMS count, email inbox count, and also temperature. I love how you can glance at your watch and in two seconds get all that useful information whereas with the stock watch faces basically have the time and if you're lucky day and date.

reply.author: Siamcybersoft Apps
reply.content: Thank you so much :)

title: Perfect layout. Makes quick glances at the watch amazing. 80% of things I want to know are always visible.

author: José Tadeo
comment: The watch face is nice but it crashes a lot. Plus this is a PAID app. What is up with these intrusive ads on my notification bar telling me to download a free iOS app? Not cool, man. UPDATE: Doesn't crash anymore and followed dev's instructions for the notification issue. Now that's some professionalism I can respect. 5 *'s.

reply.author: Siamcybersoft Apps
reply.content: Thank you for your report. We found this problem from notice system that we use from the third party. However if you don't want to get notice about free app or new watch face you can deselect "Notification for new Watch Face" on Hybrid 360 Digital watch face.

title: UPDATE: So much better
